snippet: Many of the Medicare fraud charges against prominent Florida eye doctor Salomon Melgen are complicated, but one is simple — federal prosecutors say he claimed reimbursement for treating both eyes of patients who have one prosthetic....

headline.main: Alabama City to Re-enact March That Sparked 'Bloody Sunday'
headline.print_headline: Alabama City to Re-enact March That Sparked 'Bloody Sunday'

lead_paragraph: Many of the Medicare fraud charges against prominent Florida eye doctor Salomon Melgen are complicated, but one is simple — federal prosecutors say he claimed reimbursement for treating both eyes of patients who have one prosthetic.
